<h3 id="X22837">X(22837) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: K798I TO EXCENTERS-MIDPOINTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*(b+c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22837) = 3*X(1)-X(3811) = 5*X(1)-X(6765) = 7*X(1)+X(11519) = 3*X(1)+X(12629) = 3*X(3576)+X(3680) = 3*X(3829)-2*X(18357) = X(3913)-3*X(10246) = X(6762)+3*X(16200) = 3*X(10165)-X(12640) = 3*X(10247)-X(12635) = 3*X(11194)-X(12702) = 3*X(11235)-X(18525) = 3*X(11236)-5*X(18493)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(1145).</p>
<p>X(22837) lies on these lines:
{1,2}, {3,2802}, {30,13463}, {35,3885}, {36,14923}, {72,5048}, {100,21842}, {101,4051}, {141,18261}, {214,1388}, {405,3898}, {515,10525}, {517,5450}, {518,576}, {529,22791}, {535,12699}, {758,1482}, {944,6264}, {952,3813}, {956,2098}, {958,3884}, {962,12543}, {993,3057}, {999,3754}, {1145,5433}, {1319,10914}, {1320,2975}, {1329,1387}, {1385,3880}, {1392,3467}, {1442,17151}, {1479,21630}, {1483,5499}, {2099,3874}, {3304,5883}, {3338,3919}, {3436,11813}, {3445,6095}, {3553,4856}, {3554,17355}, {3555,11011}, {3576,3680}, {3612,3895}, {3678,5289}, {3730,4919}, {3746,3897}, {3753,20323}, {3814,11376}, {3817,10599}, {3825,11373}, {3829,18357}, {3868,11009}, {3869,5288}, {3877,5258}, {3889,5425}, {3890,5251}, {3893,5440}, {3913,10246}, {3968,16408}, {4067,11682}, {4193,16173}, {4430,16126}, {5119,5267}, {5176,7741}, {5248,9957}, {5330,5692}, {5438,11525}, {5690,5854}, {5693,10698}, {5696,14151}, {5853,13607}, {5882,21627}, {5901,12607}, {6265,11256}, {6597,14497}, {6647,14377}, {6762,16200}, {6914,10284}, {6941,12751}, {7962,12514}, {8256,15325}, {8668,10269}, {9802,20066}, {10165,12640}, {10247,12635}, {10953,12053}, {11010,12653}, {11194,12702}, {11235,18525}, {11236,18493}, {11524,15015}, {12740,15863}, {13464,21077}, {18393,20060}, {19907,20400}</p>
<p>
X(22837) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 10912}, {5882, 21627}, {6265, 11256}<br>
X(22837) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 3632, 4511), (1, 4853, 997), (1, 12629, 3811), (1, 19860, 551), (8, 499, 10), (145, 10527, 12647), (956, 2098, 3878), (997, 4853, 3626), (1320, 2975, 5697), (1388, 5687, 214), (6264, 11014, 944), (10527, 12647, 10)<br>
</p>
